B FW)=== '''MD5: '''2d0bfdd6ee51b020e03b48c6d6d8d77a
File sourced from ftp://ftp.dlink.eu/Products/di/di-624plus/archive/driver_software/DI-624+_fw_revB_206b30_ALL_en_040924.zip
The firmware is an ARJ archive - it extracts to NML.MEM. The '''Global Sun''' HW platform ID in the file includes '''WLRT2454-XT0-B10'''.
The OS within the file would appear to be '''Express Logic''''s '''ThreadX''' G4.0.4.0. :The version string is '''Copyright (c) 1996-2001 Express Logic Inc. * ThreadX JADE/Green Hills Version G4.0.4.0'''.
